summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account for the period of April 1, 2016, to April 30, 2016. It details various debits and credits, including payroll fees and other transactions, along with the ending balance for the account.

persons.name: Paul Nionis
persons.context: Paul Nionis is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document summarizes account transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from April 1, 2016, to April 30, 2016.
The account had a beginning balance of $438,110.56 and an ending balance of $389,604.38.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made for payroll fees and other transactions during the month.
There were NSF return item fees totaling $50.00 for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
